No idea m8. All i know is thats the title, I think this version has the unseen extra's that arent in the original, I think its the creation of the film etc.

Thanks for sharing the Special Edition rip!

New unseen extras include: Snowbusiness Documentary, Alternative Introductions by David Bowie and Father Christmas, Storyboards and Audio Narration by Mel Smith.

If you love the song like me, then have a look at this torrent:

Walking in the Air [the original + 50 covers] - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5228538

This collection contains the original song, performed by Peter Auty, and 50 covers in a very wide range of styles.

Merry Christmas!
